TopicTitle: Crash to VAB, crash on launch, crash, crash, crash...

Articles.Content:
After 0.90 the game turned into a crash festival.

It crashes every time I switch from/to VAB after playing for some minutes.

I have a couple mods installed only, my GameData dir is 1.1GB, so I don't know if it's that memory related bug.

And even if it's, I don't care. Fed up with Unity excuses, need solutions.

How do I debug this?
